description:
Converting WORDPRESS/WOOCOMMERCE data to usable program objects 
yields a catalog of products with stocks and counts.

Definitions:

Base Product:      A base product is a simple kind of product with variations ie: MARITIME OTTOMAN, MARITIME 3P
Composite Product: A composite product is a combination of other products ie: MARITIME RAF = MARITIME OTTOMAN + MARITIME 3P
name: Product Data

elements.name: Importing DATA from WORDPRESS/WOOCOMMERCE

steps.name: I should have categories and products

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has counts

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "stockCount" of 4

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has counts

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "cartCount" of 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME 3P" has counts

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
the current product has a "stockCount" of 4

elements.name: A "MARITIME 3P" has counts

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
the current product has a "cartCount" of 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME RAF" has counts

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
the current product has a "stockCount" of 4

elements.name: A "MARITIME RAF" has counts

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
the current product has a "cartCount" of 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has choices

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "leg" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME 3P" has choices

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "leg" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME RAF" has choices

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "leg" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0

description:
Products have choices that can be selected.
Changing choices should change stock/cart counts.
Adding/Removing items from cart change stock/cart counts.

Definitions:

Base Product:      A base product is a simple kind of product with variations ie: MARITIME OTTOMAN, MARITIME 3P
Composite Product: A composite product is a combination of other products ie: MARITIME RAF = MARITIME OTTOMAN + MARITIME 3P
name: Product Choices

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" updates counts when something is selected

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice selected as "slipcover-003"
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the current product has a "stockCount" of 1
the current product has a "cartCount" of 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" updates counts when a quantity is selected

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice selected as "slipcover-003"
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 1
the current product has a "stockCount" of 0
the current product has a "cartCount" of 0

elements.name: when the user views a different product, selections on current product should be reset

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a "leg" choice set to nothing
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a stock of 4
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a cart of 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME RAF" updates counts when selected/added

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the parent "MARITIME 3P" has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the current product has a "slipcover" choice selected as "slipcover-003"
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 1
the current product has a "stockCount" of 0
the current product has a "cartCount" of 0

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" cannot be added to cart if it's missing options

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I have no leg options selected
the current product has a "leg" choice set to nothing

elements.name: A "MARITIME RAF" can be added to cart

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
the parent "MARITIME OTTOMAN" has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the parent "MARITIME 3P" has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the current product has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the current product has a "stockCount" of 3
the current product has a "cartCount" of 1

elements.name: A "MARITIME OTTOMAN" can be added to cart

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the current product has a "stockCount" of 2
the current product has a "cartCount" of 2

elements.name: A "MARITIME 3P" can be added to cart

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
the current product has a "slipcover" choice set to nothing
the current product has a "quantity" choice selected as 0
the current product has a "stockCount" of 2
the current product has a "cartCount" of 2

elements.name: Cart items should now exist in the cart.
Cart items have quantities

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 1

elements.name: Cart items can have quantities manipulated

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I increase the current cart item by 2
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 3

elements.name: Cart items can be removed

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I remove the current cart item

elements.name: Cart items can be removed

steps.name: I set the last cart item as the current cart item
I remove the current cart item

description: Prices should be consistent based on user choices. (the taxes are all set to 0.15 in these tests )
name: Product Pricing

elements.name: Items in the catalog have prices

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
the current product has a "minRegularPrice" number
the current product has a "maxRegularPrice" number
the current product has a "minSalePrice" number
the current product has a "maxSalePrice" number
the current product has a "minPrice" number
the current product has a "maxPrice" number

elements.name: Base items in the catalog have prices (not testing sales prices yet..)

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I know that the current product has a base price of $300
I know that the cheapest leg is "leg-002" at $0
I know that the most expensive leg is "leg-001" at $25
I know that the cheapest slipcover is "slipcover-006" at $0
I know that the most expensive slipcover is "slipcover-003" at $100
the current product has a "minRegularPrice" of $300
the current product has a "maxRegularPrice" of $425
the current product has a "minPrice" of $300
the current product has a "maxPrice" of $425

elements.name: Base items in the catalog have prices (not testing sales prices yet..)

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
I know that the current product has a base price of $900
I know that the cheapest leg is "leg-002" at $0
I know that the most expensive leg is "leg-001" at $25
I know that the cheapest slipcover is "slipcover-006" at $0
I know that the most expensive slipcover is "slipcover-003" at $150
the current product has a "minRegularPrice" of $900
the current product has a "maxRegularPrice" of $1075
the current product has a "minPrice" of $900
the current product has a "maxPrice" of $1075
the current product has a "currentPrice" of $900

elements.name: Base items in the catalog change prices when selections are made (not testing sales prices yet..)

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
I know that the current product has a base price of $900
I know that the most expensive leg is "leg-001" at $25
I know that the cheapest slipcover is "slipcover-006" at $0
the current product has a "minRegularPrice" of $900
the current product has a "maxRegularPrice" of $1075
the current product has a "currentPrice" of $900
the current product has a "currentPrice" of $925

elements.name: Composite items in the catalog have prices (not testing sales prices yet..)

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME RAF" as the current product
I know that the current product has a base price of $1200
I know that the cheapest leg is "leg-002" at $0
I know that the most expensive leg is "leg-001" at $50
I know that the cheapest slipcover is "slipcover-006" at $0
I know that the most expensive slipcover is "slipcover-003" at $250
the current product has a "minRegularPrice" of $1200
the current product has a "maxRegularPrice" of $1500
the current product has a "minPrice" of $1200
the current product has a "maxPrice" of $1500

description: Prices should be consistent based on quantities and location (the taxes are all set to 0.15 in these tests )
name: Cart Pricing

elements.name: Cart items have prices (using MARITIME OTTOMAN added in cart from another scenario)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 1
the current cart item has a "minRegularPrice" of $300
the current cart item has a "maxRegularPrice" of $425
the current cart item has a "minPrice" of $300
the current cart item has a "maxPrice" of $425
the current cart item has a "itemCost" of $425

elements.name: Cart items multiply prices based on quantity (using MARITIME OTTOMAN added from another scenario)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 1
I increase the current cart item by 2
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 3
the current cart item has a "minRegularPrice" of $900
the current cart item has a "maxRegularPrice" of $1275
the current cart item has a "minPrice" of $900
the current cart item has a "maxPrice" of $1275
the current cart item has a "itemCost" of $1275

elements.name: The cart shipping cost changes when I set a zone (above minimum)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 3

elements.name: The cart shipping cost changes when I change to zone 1 (above minimum)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item

elements.name: The cart shipping cost changes when I change to zone 2 (above minimum)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item

elements.name: The cart shipping cost changes when I change to zone 1 (below minimum)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
the current cart item has a "quantity" choice of 3
I decrease the current cart item by 2

elements.name: The cart shipping cost changes when I change zone 2 (below minimum)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item

elements.name: The cart shipping cost changes when I change zone 3 (below minimum)

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item

elements.name: A cart knows nothing about shipping and taxes if it has no postal code

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I reset the zone to nothing
I do not provide a postal code

elements.name: A cart knows the shipping taxes and zone for a postal code

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I provide a postal code of "H2A 2A2"

elements.name: A cart knows the shipping taxes and zone for a postal code

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I provide a postal code of "Z0R 1M2"

elements.name: A cart knows the shipping taxes and zone for a postal code

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I provide a postal code of "J07 2B4"

elements.name: A cart can have it's zone cleared

steps.name: I set the first cart item as the current cart item
I reset the zone to nothing

description:
The cart can have coupons,
  these should be included in the calculations
  when avaialable.
name: Cart Pricing With Coupons

elements.name: A coupon can be applied

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
a coupon for %15 off regular products

elements.name: Another coupon can also be applied

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
a coupon for %10 off regular products

elements.name: a coupon can be removed

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
a coupon for %10 off regular products
the cart has no discounts including 0.10

elements.name: another coupon can be removed

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
a coupon for %15 off regular products
the cart has no discounts including 0.10
the cart has no discounts including 0.15

description:
The cart can have special rates for some members,
  these should be included in the calculations
  when avaialable.
name: Cart Pricing With Special Rates

elements.name: A VIP user has 5% of regular products

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product

elements.name: A VVIP user has 10% of regular products

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product

elements.name: A VVVIP user has 15% of regular products

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product

elements.name: A NORMAL user has 0% of regular products

steps.name: I use a "MARITIME OTTOMAN" as the current product
I use a "MARITIME 3P" as the current product
